name: WhyteHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on my room light”
”Alexa, turn off my room light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Whyte Smart Living offers the most comprehensive voice controlled smart home/office experience with Alexa. Control everything like lighting and other devices hands free. Just say it and it will obey. 

Here's a step by step guide:
1. Download our "Whyte Smart Living" app in Google Play or iOS App Store;
2. Launch the app and register/login to your account;
3. Download Amazon "Alexa" app from Amazon Market, Google Play or iOS App Store, and connect Echo with "Alexa" app;
4. Search the Alexa Skills directory for "Whyte Smart Living";
5. Click Enable skill of "Whyte Smart Living", then input your account username, password on the linking page;
6. Alexa app will then discover devices. Wait till it says "Discover is completed";
7. Now all setup is done. Try talk to Echo to control your devices.

Here are the voice commands Smart Life has:

Note - you have to use the equipment names that you've given in the Whyte Smart Living mobile app, ex- "livingroom AC" for equipment air conditioner in living room

Lights:
* Alexa, turn on my livingroom light
* Alexa, turn off my livingroom light

Fans:
* Alexa, set livingroom fan to 2
* Alexa, set bedroom fan to 5
* Alexa, turn off livingroom fan

Air Conditioner:
* Alexa, set livingroom ac to 22
* Alexa, turn of livingroom ac
* Alexa, set cool on livingroom ac

Curtains/Blinds:
* Alexa, set livingroom blinds to 10 percent
* Alexa, set livingroom blinds to 30 percent
* Alexa, set livingroom blinds to 100 percent

Television/Set-Top Box:
* Alexa, turn on livingroom TV
* Alexa, set Star Gold on livingroom Set-Top Box
* Alexa, set Star Movies on livingroom Set-Top Box

Misc:
* Alexa, turn on bathroom gyser
* Alexa, turn off kitchen chimney
* Alexa, turn off rope lights

If you have any problems, please contact us at support@whyte.co.in
